author: ajaquith
msg: Fixed bug in HandlerInfo that was preventing evaluation of permissions when <null> pages were set.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-909 adapt JcrResourceResolver2 to the now consistent definition
of the ResourceResolver.resolve methods and fix the unit tests

author: ajaquith
msg: Eliminated nearly every reference to PageManager with ContentManager in the code, plus or minus about two references. JSPs not checked yet.

author: ajaquith
msg: [JSPWIKI-304] Changed all Workflow signatures so that all attribute values are now Serializable. This has required some minor changes to WikiContext get/setAttribute, such that these must also be Serializable too. In practice this is not a problem, because all attributes passed to WikiContext were always Strings anyway. The net effect of this change is that we can now make workflows persistent across engine restarts! (Coming later...)
